name: Coruno - Multiplayer Card Game
description:
A classical Uno-inspired game where you can play with your friends! (Optimized for 12 maximum, but there're no limitations)

Unique friendship destroyer, made in one month by Char[3]Studio.

N.B: 

  • To host a game online you need your port opened on 7777 UDP & TCP
  • No need to open ports if it's on LAN.
  • If you find any bugs please contact me via bryckout2@gmail.com
